name: RINGO
description:
This NFT grants you exclusive access to the Viral Sauce Virtual Community and The Urban Blockchain Academy . 
  Our goal is to create customized NFT Avatars       and wearables for the metaverse. 
We also provide alternative music solutions for Independent artist through blockchain technology. We wanna simplify the NFT onboarding process for beginners by playing games and making art relevant to the blockchain and crypto space. Every NFT purchase will go to helping the Urban Community learn why Cryptocurrency exist and how it’s used. Upon purchase your wallet address will be entered into a raffle to win $100 in tezos, 10 NFTs from our collection of your choice, and a custom NFT avatar with features of your choice with upgraded accessories. 
All members of the Urban Blockchain Academy must be present in the Viral Sauce Clubhouse at the time of drawing.The drawing will be held @ 3:00pm est on Christmas 12/25/2021. The winner will be security checked by a secret NFT Drop declaring you the winner. When the last 5 digits in the wallet is pronounced you will reveal what your deposit was.
   All proceeds will go to educating and onboarding Urban Artist into the NFT/Crypto space and building a virtual space in the Metaverse for Members of the Urban Blockchain Academy, that connects to the NFT Marketplace. Thanks for your support.
The Urban Blockchain Academy,
 Hope to see you in the Metaverse. 
Admin DYRT 
Artwork by Mr. Low Eyes
